definition: to hang or suspend (from a hook etc)/to hang up (the phone)/(of a line) to be dead/to be worried or concerned/to make a phone call (dialect)/to register or record/classifier for sets or clusters of objects/(slang) to kill/to die/to be finished/to fail (an exam)
thread/string/wire/line/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3],根[gen1]/(after a number) tier (unofficial ranking of a Chinese city)

sentences.english: Can you please hold the line while I check with the reservation department of the hotel?
sentences.chinese: 請別掛線，我替你查一下我們賓館的客房預定。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the curative effect of contradrainage and thread drawing method to treat high anal horseshoe fistula (HAHS).
sentences.chinese: 目的探討對口引流掛線在治療高位馬蹄瘻的效果。

sentences.english: Control lines shall be used for bricklaying.
sentences.chinese: 砌磚時應掛線進行砌築。

sentences.english: Hold the line, please. I'll get you through.
sentences.chinese: 請不要掛線，我這就給您轉過去。

sentences.english: The other group of 12 cases were treated with traditional low incision & high thread-drawing.
sentences.chinese: 對照組12例，採用傳統低位切開高位掛線治療。

sentences.english: Hold on please, and I will process your application right now.
sentences.chinese: 請不要掛線，我現在爲您辦理續借手續。

sentences.english: We now go for the upside-down, flat spin rotation.
sentences.chinese: 我們現在要開始由上到下掛線的平轉。

sentences.english: Hold the line， please. Let me have a check.
Please hold on for a minute.
sentences.chinese: 請不要掛線，稍等一會兒。

sentences.english: After conduit dissections or hanging a line, all need local change medicine.
sentences.chinese: 管道切開或掛線後，均需局部換藥。

sentences.english: I'll put you through to the room, hold on the line please?
sentences.chinese: 請不要掛線，我將會幫你把電話轉上房間。

sentences.english: I'm trying to connect your long distance call to you, please hold on.
sentences.chinese: 請不要掛線，我正幫您把長途電話轉過來。

definition: to ignore/to brush off/to dismiss/to pay no attention to
to whisper to one another's ear
medical doctor/physician who works primarily by administering drugs, as opposed to surgeon 外科醫生|外科医生[wai4 ke1 yi1 sheng1]
to follow sb closely (idiom)/to keep close to
see 驚慌失措|惊慌失措[jing1 huang1 shi1 cuo4]
to reply to a telegram/to wire back
to carry out a vendetta against sb
